nodes.text: Which smartphone component would you like to dismantle?

steps.action: Power off the smartphone and remove the SIM card.
Use a heat gun or hair dryer to soften the adhesive.
Gently pry open the back cover using a plastic tool.
Disconnect the battery connector from the motherboard.
Carefully lift the battery out of its compartment.
Power off the smartphone and remove the SIM card.
Use a heat gun or hair dryer to soften the adhesive.
Gently pry open the back cover using a plastic tool.
Disconnect the camera connector from the motherboard.
Carefully lift the camera module out of its compartment.
Locate the SIM card tray on the side of the device.
Use a SIM eject tool or paperclip to push into the small hole next to the tray.
Gently pull out the SIM card tray and remove the SIM card.
